thread.title: Did you know Mohit Marwah auditioned for 'Aashiqui 2'?
thread.title_full: Did you know Mohit Marwah auditioned for 'Aashiqui 2'? - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: Did you know Mohit Marwah auditioned for 'Aashiqui 2'?
text:
Not many know that 'Fugly' actor Mohit Marwah had auditioned for Mohit Suri's 2013 film, 'Aashiqui 2'.

Mohit Suri and Mohit Marwah 
The role eventually went to Aditya Roy Kapur, but the actor was keen to work with his namesake.
He finally got the chance to work with him in the recently released music video, Lamhein. News is that they might do a film together.
